label: location
description: name of location where sampled

label: latitude
description: latitude of location where sampled (-90 to 90 deg South to North)

label: longitude
description: longitude of location where sampled (-180 to 180 West to East)

label: vegetation
description: vegetation type where sampled if grown in field (leave blank for plantations / glasshouse / common garden): Sav = Savannah; TropRF = Tropical rainforest; TempRF = Temperate rainforest; TropSF = Tropical seasonal forest; TempF = Temperate forest; BorF = Boreal forest; Wo = Woodland; Gr = Grassland; Sh = Shrubland; De = Desert

label: map
description: mean annual rainfall (wild grown plants only)

label: mat
description: mean annual temperature (wild grown plants only)

label: grouping
description: any information about growing environment of sampled plant such as treatment or subplot

label: lai
description: leaf area index of vegetation (wild plants only)

label: species
description: latin name of species (genus species)

label: family
description: family

label: pft
description: plant functional type: EA = evergreen angiosperm; DA = deciduous angiosperm; EG = evergreen gymnosperm; DG = deciduous gymnosperm

label: growing environment
description: growing environment of sampled plant: FW = field wild; FE =field experimental; GH = glasshouse; PU = plantation unmanaged; PM = plantation managed; GC = growth chamber; CG = common garden

label: crown status
description: position in forest canopy (wild grown plants only): 0 = supressed; 1 = intermediate; 2 = codominant (crown partly exposed); 3 = dominant (crown fully exposed)

label: light environment
description: note any information about light environment of sampled plant; we will determine appropriate categories once we see what information is available

label: age
description: age of plant expressed as decimal -> e.g. 3months = 0.25years

label: leaf area
description: leaf area of whole plant

label: sapwood area at base
description: area of sapwood cross section at base

label: sapwood area at breast height
description: area of sapwood cross section at breast height

label: sapwood area at crown base
description: area of sapwood cross section at base of crown

label: heartwood area at base
description: area of heartwood cross section at base

label: heartwood area at breast height
description: area of heartwood cross section at breast height

label: heartwood area at crown base
description: area of heartwood cross section at base of crown

label: bark area at base
description: area of bark cross section at base

label: bark area at breast height
description: area of bark cross section at breast height

label: bark area at crown base
description: area of bark cross section at base of crown

label: stem area at base
description: area of total stem cross-section at base of the plant

label: stem area at breast height
description: area of total stem cross-section at breast height

label: stem area at crown base
description: area of total stem cross-section at base of the crown

label: crown area
description: projected crown area as seen from above

label: crown surface area
description: surface area of whole crown

label: height
description: total height of plant from ground to highest leaf

label: height to crown base
description: height to crown base

label: basal diameter
description: diameter of stem at base

label: dbh
description: diameter of stem at breast height

label: height of d.bh measurement
description: height at which diameter at breast height (d.bh) is measured

label: crown width
description: diameter or width of crown

label: crown depth
description: crown depth

label: leaf mass
description: leaf mass

label: sapwood mass
description: sapwood mass including branches

label: heartwood mass
description: heartwood mass including branches

label: bark mass
description: bark mass including branches

label: total stem mass
description: mass of all stem tissue including branches (=m.ss + m.sh + m.sb)

label: aboveground mass
description: mass of all above-ground structures (=m.lf + m.st)

label: branch mass
description: branch mass

label: fine root mass
description: fine root mass

label: coarse root mass
description: coarse root mass

label: total root mass
description: total root mass (=m.rf+m.rc)

label: total mass
description: total mass (=m.rt+m.so)

label: area of individual leaf
description: leaf size (average area of individual leaves across entire plant)

label: leaf mass per area
description: leaf mass per area (average across entire plant or sample taken from top of plant; = m.lf/a.lf)

label: wood density
description: average density of all stem tissue (wood density)

label: sapwood density
description: density of stem sapwood

label: bark density
description: density of stem bark

label: heartwood density
description: density of stem heartwood

label: leaf [nitrogen]
description: leaf nitrogen (average across entire plant or sample taken from top of plant)

label: sapwood [nitrogen]
description: nitrogen content of sapwood

label: bark [nitrogen]
description: nitrogen content of bark

label: heartwood [nitrogen]
description: nitrogen content of heartwood

label: fine root [nitrogen]
description: nitrogen content of fine roots

label: coarse root [nitrogen]
description: nitrogen content of coarse roots
